name: Stars Defender - Milky Way Invasion
description:
Our galaxy, The Milky Way is being invaded by aliens from another galaxy. You as choosen space pilot, assigned to stop the invasion of these aliens.

Stars Defender is 2D Space Shooter game with Pixel Art style. There will be several waves of enemies on each levels. You have to defeat all enemies to complete each level.

How to play ?

  • Touch and Drag to move player

How to install ?

  1. Download the apk file.
  2. Enable "Allow App Installation from Unknown Source" in the settings.
  3. Install the apk.
  4. If the warning "Blocked by Play Protect" appears, press "Install Anyway".
  5. Done.

Thanks to these people for the great assets :

  • Space Shooter Asset Pack by Gustavo Vituri
  • Starfield Background Sprite by Kenney.nl
  • 5 Action Chiptunes by Juhani Junkala
  • Sci-Fi Sounds by Kenney.nl
  • MinimalPixel Font by Mounir Tohami

Thanks for playing my games, and i hope you can enjoy this game.
